title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. You will build and maintain RESTful APIs using Python and FastAPI. Requirements: 5+ years experience, Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, proficiency in Python, SQL, Docker, and AWS. Salary range: KES 250,000 - 400,000 per month.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Marketing Manager needed to lead digital campaigns and brand strategy. Must have 3 years experience in marketing, strong communication skills, and experience with social media management, SEO, and Google Analytics. MBA preferred. Competitive salary.

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Entry-level Data Analyst position. Analyze business data using SQL and Excel. Create dashboards in Tableau. Certificate or diploma in statistics or related field required. Salary: KES 80,000 - 120,000.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps Engineer to manage CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes clusters, and cloud infrastructure on AWS and GCP. 4+ years experience required. Bachelor's degree in IT or equivalent. Must know Terraform, Ansible, Jenkins, and monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Accounts Assistant
description: Accounts Assistant to handle bookkeeping, reconciliations, and financial reporting. CPA Part II required. Experience with QuickBooks and SAP preferred. 1-2 years experience. Salary: KES 45,000 - 65,000 per month.
